page.title: 15A DOLPHINTON TEENAGER
page.content: I am a teenager who has lived in the village for the past four years. On leaving school I entrolled on a two year Catering Course at a college in Edinburgh. When I completed the course in June this year I was very fortunate in obtaining employment with a large Catering Company in Edinburgh, who have canteens in large offices. I travel to work every day. During the winter months I play badminton in the village hall two evenings a week. For entertainment my friends and I have to travelk outside the village to West Linton, Peebles or Biggar to discos. I also go swimming once a week to the new swimming pool which was built quite recently at Peebles. My record collection is quite varied and I spend a lot of my spare time listening to it. We also have a video recorder and I like watching films on television.
